description:
I've designed this course for you to learn web design and business principles to start your freelance web design career, escape 9-5 and become your own boss.

The goal of this course is to give you an overview of the industry, provide you with essential knowledge of design, technical and business skills.

If you are bored and are looking for ways to escape your job, learn new skills and design your own lifestyle and if you think you are not talented enough and have a fear of failing - don't worry. This this course is specifically for you.

You will master the essentials of web design, I will walk you through the process of creating a website (free PSD included) in Adobe Photoshop and will touch a business side of freelancing including developing your unique selling proposition, building a reputation, building a portfolio with no coding knowledge and getting your first client.
title: Learn Web Design and Start Your Freelance Business
